subscription_alternative.monthly_limit: Up to 80 messages every 3 hours on GPT-4o; unlimited on GPT-4o mini. Limits are dynamic and subject to change based on capacity.
5x the usage limit of the free tier, allowing for significantly more conversations. Exact token count is not specified.

pricing_analysis.subscription_adoption_rate: High and growing, driven by power users seeking consistent access and integrated experiences, though exact public figures are not disclosed.
pricing_analysis.trend: Aggressive price competition is significantly lowering the cost per token for top-tier models. The market is bifurcating between pay-per-use APIs for developers and flat-rate subscription models for consumer-facing products, with a focus on ecosystem lock-in and integrated AI suites.
